title: How to make your girlfriend laugh - Quora

response.answer_text: First, make sure she has a sense of humor. If not, get a different girlfriend. Say something humorous to someone without humor and you can expect a humorless challenge of your premise. Not. Worth. The. Trouble. Now, to make her laugh: say something humorous. Or stand on your head. Or try to impress her with your brilliance. Or tickle her.

Comedic timing. That is what you are wanting. So find out what she thinks is funny and test it out with her here and there. One item to remember is that no one makes someone laugh. And another one is that there are different types of humor and not all bring a laugh. Some bring a smile or a chuckle or a smirk. There is nothing wrong with any of those.
